attributes.action: Cut the Wages of all the BBC Presenters to the level of inflation since 1981
attributes.additional_details:
Cut Presenters wages and 
Bring back FREE TV licences for over 75’s
attributes.background: 1981 Kenneth Kendall earn’t £16,000 for 8 million viewers. In 2019 this would be worth £61000. Huw Edwards earns £490,000 for 5 million viewers. By my calculations that’s a 703% increase, so Huw Edwards should be earning £61,000. Now the BBC wants to cut FREE TV licences for over 75 year olds.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. BBC salaries are a matter for the BBC

You might like to sign this petition on the TV licence:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259179
